paper_abstract: The paper is concerned with a project of data integration system designed for work in the Linked Open Data space. A system architecture is suggested, and basic principles of its functioning are discussed. For data integration, it is proposed to use a combined approach based on Linked Data sets. The system can be applied for integration of data from numerous autonomous sources, between which sufficiently stable links may be identified.
paper_title: Scientific data integration system in the linked open data space
